channel.title: Posts on PepperTheVixen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on PepperTheVixen

item.title: We're on Spotify!
item.description: You may have noticed a shiny new link on the homepage. Yup, we’re on Spotify now. Apple Music and iTunes, too. Amazon music is lagging, but we’ll get there. If you’d rather buy my stuff outright, I’ll be posting on Bandcamp as well! Follow me on Spotify Folow me on Bandcamp I’m super excited to finally be on the major music stores. It means that I can get my music to more people.

item.title: The First Track
item.description: I recently published my first track, Dwarven Future, and I have an awful lot to say about it. Getting Into Music This has been a long time coming, and a journey that started almost 2 years ago. I began with a Yamaha Reface CS and later an Arturia Drum Brute Impact. Since then, I’ve slowly built up a collection of equipment to make music entirely on my own. Doing it Blind This was the single largest barrier to getting into music production.
